target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The audit reported no findings, so the target vulnerability was not identified at all.

notes: The audit failed to identify the critical access control vulnerability in setLockRecipient. This function allows the admin to arbitrarily change the recipient of any user's locked funds, enabling theft of user deposits. This is a classic insider threat scenario similar to the Munchables incident referenced in the ground truth. The vulnerability exists at lines 77-83.
